# Government Tender Notice
## National Review of Provincial/Territorial Net Zero Regulatory Profiles
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Project Overview
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking proposals from qualified bidders to undertake a comprehensive study examining the energy regulatory and policy landscape in provinces and territories across Canada. The study aims to provide a national review of provincial and territorial net zero regulatory profiles, identifying key factors influencing energy innovation and system-wide carbon reduction goals.

#### Key Tender Details
* Reference Number: PW-22-01016127
* Solicitation Number: 5000070166
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-24T14:00:00
* Amendments: 5 (See attachment for details)

#### Required Service Description
The proposal request seeks a team or individual with expertise in energy studies, including federal buildings initiative, to undertake this comprehensive study. The successful bidder will be responsible for examining the following:
* Provincial and territorial energy regulatory policies and directives
* Net zero emission targets and progress
* Energy innovation systems and infrastructure

#### Procurement Category
* Service (SRV)
* Competitive: Open bidding

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity
* Worldwide
* Canada

#### Regions of Delivery
* Canada
* National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Attachment
The tender notice includes multiple attachments (5), which are available on the Canada Buys website.
